channel.title: Botting?
channel.description:
Does anyone still bot on Runescape?
If so what bots do you use? I've been using nexus boss but I don't think its that good :/

item.title: Botting?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:50, topic:437353”]buy 2 monitors

skill in one

YOUTUBE IN THE OTHER

DAMN FUCKING STRAIGHT[/quote]

Pretty baller idea. Hadn’t thought of that. Catch up on my DBZ

item.title: Botting?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

JavaTC:

Everyone that trains legitly on RS is so mad at bots because they actually worked for their levels. The problem is that you could have stats like that too if you don’t sit at the fucking GE for 4 hours at a time… It shouldn’t even matter how others train, you should just worry about you and leave the bots alone, because you’ll never stop them.

This.

Read full topic

item.title: Botting?
item.dc:creator: @OmgItsShane Shane
item.description:
@OmgItsShane wrote:

@ People saying there accounts stolen on Epicbot. If you put your account on EpicBot in the “accounts” section it will get stolen but, if you don’t you can bot and they can’t get your account. Don’t put your account info on it.
